sub_terms.a: the acquisition of real or personal property under the laws of intestacy or sometimes by will
sub_terms.b: the succession upon the death of an owner either by will or by operation of law to all the estate, rights, and liabilities of the decedent

2 a.definition: something that is or may be inherited

sub_terms.b: something to which one is entitled as heir [increasing the son's potential under [the] will ", 577 So. 2d 856 (1991)"]
